location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Harford Jones at Tauris to Stephen Babington Esq., in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Sir Harford Jones, at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Stephen Babington Esq., in Charge of the Residency at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 29 July regarding the seizure of the Persian Monsieur Robbio, charged by Mr. Babington at Bushire for holding despatches and his papers, and noticing that he should have handled the situation more respectfully towards citizens of Sovereign states.
